author: Take this!
Lookout below!
Think fast, chucklenuts!
Dodge this!
Here, catch!
Class, here's our demonstration of projectile motion!
I've got a killer knuckle-ball!
For three!
Parry this, thou filthy casual.
You'll never dodge your taxes if you can't dodge this!
target: Ow! Why'd you throw that at me?
Get over here so I can shove this up your-
*opens mouth and swallows it whole* Thanks for the meal!
